snippet: The new BlackBerry phone, though just a prototype for testing software, was real. But most of what Research In Motion demonstrated at a meeting for software developers and large customers was more of a preview than reality.
abstract: The new BlackBerry phone, though just a prototype for testing software, was real. But most of what Research In Motion demonstrated at a meeting for software developers and large customers was more of a preview than reality.

headline.main: In BlackBerry Fields, Some Things Aren't Real
